mutants.original_line: return '-' + octal if is_negative else octal
mutants.mutated_line: return '-' - octal if is_negative else octal

mutants.original_line: return '-' + octal if is_negative else octal
mutants.mutated_line: return '-' * octal if is_negative else octal

mutants.original_line: return '-' + octal if is_negative else octal
mutants.mutated_line: return '' + octal if is_negative else octal
